message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its value may differ. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $95. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $95 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. To continue our negotiation, I propose a price of $90 for the product. This is a bit higher than your offer, but still lower than my initial asking price. I hope we can reach an agreement that suits both of us.

Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still hesitant to go above $85. It's the absolute maximum I can afford at this moment. I'm confident this is a fair price, considering your initial offer and my willingness to negotiate.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
